description: This data set measures and describes participation in PIRP. The researcher may ascertain how many motorists have completed the course and tabulate subsets by: year and month of course completion; motorist residency, age and sex; course provider and delivery method.

metadata.description: This data set measures and describes participation in PIRP. The researcher may ascertain how many motorists have completed the course and tabulate subsets by: year and month of course completion; motorist residency, age and sex; course provider and delivery method.

name: Motor Vehicle Point & Insurance Reduction Program (PIRP) Participation: Five Year Window
